Alexander Smirnoff
I've tested against J2SE 1.4.2_04: it had the same result.
which build are you using for testing

I've tested against latest integration build, both CVS (derived from
directory.txt) and downloaded build.

The problem occurs, if you have a server that depends on a removed Runtime 
definition.
NPE occured when no server type definition was configured yet. Fixed that.
Verifying bug on behalf of user.
